messages.content: What enhancement does the LoadImageWithSwitch node provide over the official LoadImage node?
The LoadImageWithSwitch node has an added switch feature allowing it to be turned off to prevent image loading.
How does the ImageBatchOneOrMore node differ from the official ImageBatch node?
The ImageBatchOneOrMore node can input one or more images up to six, whereas the official ImageBatch node is limited to two images.
Can the LoadImageWithSwitch node completely disable image loading?
Yes, when the switch is turned off, the LoadImageWithSwitch node will not load the image.
What is the maximum number of images that the ImageBatchOneOrMore node can input?
The ImageBatchOneOrMore node can input a maximum of six images.
